item.title: Saint Laurent Stars: Why Amal, Angelina, and More Fell for Hedi Slimane's Designs
item.description:
Saint Laurent Stars: Why Amal, Angelina, and More Fell for Hedi Slimane's Designs

In his four years as creative director of Saint Laurent, Hedi Slimane managed to craft a highly compelling vision for the French house, one that gave louche Parisian elegance a distinctive rock 'n' roll beat.

item.title: Cara Delevingne's Candid Tweets About Depression are Personal-And Powerful
item.description:
Cara Delevingne's Candid Tweets About Depression are Personal-And Powerful

Cara Delevingne has never been one to hide what she really thinks. Famous for her candid Twitter remarks about paparazzi and Internet slander, her dry sense of humor, and her mastery of inspirational Instagram quotes, the model turned actress has garnered tens of millions of followers on social media for her unguarded frankness.
